games.name: Slope
games.description: Slope is a fun endless running game created by RobKayS. Guide a rolling ball down a steep, neon-lit slope while avoiding obstacles and staying on the platform. Be careful – if you hit a red block or fall off the edge, it's game over! Play Slope and experience what life is like racing at breakneck speeds through an infinite 3D course. If you succeed, you'll rack up high scores and test your reflexes – but be careful, the speed keeps increasing and the course gets more treacherous! Experience Slope online right from your browser with Classroom-gg and test your reaction time and hand-eye coordination skills. You can play Slope for free, but one wrong move will end your run.
games.instructions:
Controls:
Arrow Keys or A/D - Steer left and right
Tips and tricks:

Don't be afraid to make small adjustments rather than sharp turns to maintain control.
Use the anticipation skills you've developed to look ahead and plan your path before obstacles appear!

About the creator:
Slope is created by RobKayS, known for developing addictive skill-based arcade games with minimalist design.

games.name: Run 3
games.description: Run 3 is a fun endless runner game created by Player 03. Navigate through space tunnels by running and jumping while gravity shifts around you. Be careful – if you fall into the void or hit obstacles, you'll have to restart from the last checkpoint! Play Run 3 and experience what life is like running through an infinite cosmic obstacle course. If you succeed, you'll unlock new characters and discover secret tunnels – but be careful, levels get more complex with rotating gravity and challenging gaps! Experience Run 3 online right from your browser with Classroom-gg and test your spatial awareness and platforming skills. You can play Run 3 for free, but a wrong jump will send you into space.
games.instructions:
Controls:
Arrow Keys or WASD - Move and jump
Space - Jump
Tips and tricks:

Don't be afraid to use the walls and ceiling as the floor when gravity shifts.
Use the different characters you've unlocked – each has unique abilities that help in specific tunnel types!

About the creator:
Run 3 is created by Player 03, known for developing the popular Run series with innovative gravity-based mechanics.

If you succeed, you'll achieve high scores and fill the screen – but be careful, the longer you get, the harder it becomes to maneuver! Experience Snake online right from your browser with Classroom-gg and test your planning and reflexes skills. You can play Snake for free, but one wrong turn will end your run.
games.instructions:
Controls:
Arrow Keys or WASD - Change direction
Tips and tricks:

Don't be afraid to follow the edges of the screen to create more space in the center.
Use the spiral pattern you've learned to safely navigate as your snake grows longer!

About the creator:
Snake is a classic game concept originally created by Gremlin Industries, reimagined in countless versions across gaming history.
